mapper.select: SELECT tsd.domain_idx, tdg.domain_group_nm, tdc.domain_category_nm, tsd.domain_nm, tsd.data_type, tsd.data_length, FROM tb_domain_group tdg JOIN tb_domain_category tdc ON tdg.domain_group_idx = tdc.domain_group_idx JOIN tb_std_domain tsd ON tdc.domain_category_idx = tsd.domain_category_idx WHERE domain_idx > #{(pageNum - 1) * 20} ORDER BY domain_idx ASC LIMIT 20;

SELECT tsd.domain_idx, tdg.domain_group_nm, tdc.domain_category_nm, tsd.domain_nm, tsd.domain_desc, tsd.data_type, tsd.data_length, tsd.decimal_point_length, tsd.allowed_values tsd.store_format, tsd.represent_format, FROM tb_domain_group tdg JOIN tb_domain_category tdc ON tdg.domain_group_idx = tdc.domain_group_idx JOIN tb_std_domain tsd ON tdc.domain_category_idx = tsd.domain_category_idx WHERE domain_idx = #{domain_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_std_domain (domain_category_idx, domain_nm, domain_desc, data_type, data_length, decimal_point_length, store_format, represent_format, allowed_values) values (1, '테스트도메인', '테스트도메인설명', 'VARCHAR', 10, 0, 'VARCHAR', 'VARCHAR', '테스트허용값');
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_std_term SET term_logical_nm = #{term_logical_nm}, term_logical_desc = #{term_logical_desc}, term_physical_nm = #{term_physical_nm}, term_physical_desc = #{term_physical_desc}, domain_idx = #{domain_idx} WHERE domain_idx = #{domain_idx}
